heading: old bones
subheading: fossils of an apparent human ancestor believed to have lived 5 million years ago have been discovered in ethiopia. a team of researchers found the fossils in the awash valley, where the 3.2 million-year-old partial skeleton of an early hominid called lucy was discovered in 1974.
author: wired staff
text: fossils of an apparent human ancestor believed to have lived 5 million years ago have been discovered in ethiopia. a team of researchers found the fossils in the awash valley, where the 3.2 million-year-old partial skeleton of an early hominid called lucy was discovered in 1974.
